name: Walker
specifications: Lightweight aluminum or steel frame; four legs with rubber tips; height adjustable; weight approximately 2–5 kg.
function: Provides stable support for patients with impaired balance or strength during walking.
usage: Ensure walker is adjusted to the patient’s height; instruct patient to move walker forward first, then step; stay nearby for assistance.
maintenance: Inspect frame and grips before use; ensure rubber tips are in good condition; clean after each use.
warning: Incorrect height setting or using the walker on slippery surfaces.
